document.full_text: britain endorsed french finance minister christine lagarde as an "outstanding candidate" for imf chief on saturday, the first g7 country to officially back her as dominique strauss-kahn's successor.
document.title: britain endorses lagarde as new imf chief
lines_and_colors: britain endorsed french finance minister christine lagarde as an "outstanding candidate" for imf chief on saturday, the first g7 country to officially back her as dominique strauss-kahn's successor.
